column1: * 1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Christopher Tolkien (9 October 1945).

* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at the Auditorium Theatre in wikipedia:Chicago
* 2014 - The Adventures of Tom Bombadil#Expanded edition is published.
